title: Champion Grade not fair to Supports!!!!!
body: I just finished a game, i was playing Thresh with 2/0/10, however I only got a Grade B for that play, and my adc who was with 6/2/7 and top with 8/3/0, both of them got Grade S!!!!!!!  Why was dat?????? This is so ridiculous!!!!!!!! If Riot keeps valuing  their customers like this, you will lose us!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body: Just got an S on a support as Illaoi with 6/8/20. You need more assists, has no deaths barely has any influence on rating i find.
finished a game with 4/1/17, still got a B, this game is so fking omg!
